In version 2.0 many of the paid features are now included but they come with advertising. If you prefer to remove the advertisements altogether, please purchase the paid version called CalliPro محترف الخط. You will find it by scrolling down this page to "More By This Developer".

في التحديث 2.0، تم إضافة العديد من ميزات النسخة المدفوعة ولكن البعض منها تتطلب مشاهدة إعلان لاستخدامها

١ـ تقليل إظهار الاعلانات
٢- تصليح مشكلة حفظ كصورة في حال عدم وجود انترنت
٣- تصليح بعض المشاكل الاخرى

Major update where many features from the paid version are now included such as:
1. Newer UI 
2. Added a variety of vector shapes.
3. Added the ability to change the color and the width of the text and shapes outline.
4. Made the main toolbar scrollable to hold more tools.
and more...
